name: PETIT IDOLM@STER Twelve Seasons! Vol.5
summary: PETIT IDOLM@STER Twelve Seasons! Vol.5 is an album released by Media Factory at the price of ￥1260 on February 6, 2013. This CD includes two new songs by the Futami Twins, a solo version of the Puchimasu! theme La♪La♪La♪Wonderland, and an original drama track. Also included is an off vocal version of the first song featured on the CD.
info:
• 艺术家: 双海亜美・真美&こあみ・こまみ(CV:下田麻美)
  • 版本特性: Single / Maxi
  • 发售日期: 2013-02-06
  • 价格: ￥ 1,260
  • 录音: メディアファクトリー
  • 发行商: メディアファクトリー
